vclaim: Over-the-counter painkiller paracetamol is contaminated with the Machupo virus and should be avoided.
title: Is Paracetamol Contaminated with the Deadly ‘Machupo’ Virus?
subtitle: Hoax warnings claimed that paracetamol (or acetaminophen) is contaminated with a dangerous virus, and its use should therefore be avoided.
author: Kim LaCapria
